trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= password>" name="<input type= password>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang til HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= password>" name="<input type= password>" href=""> </xref> element på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputPassword class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText> class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password.
trans-unit.target: HtmlInputPassword klassen hentes fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>klasse og brukes til å opprette en enkelt linje tekstboks som gir brukeren må oppgi et passord.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>

trans-unit.source: When using the HtmlInputPassword control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker HtmlInputPassword-kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>egenskapen posteres til serveren hver gang skjemaet er sendt.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property for the HtmlInputPassword control is not persisted in view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>egenskapen for HtmlInputPassword kontrollen ikke er i visningen fast tilstand.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A> property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A>egenskapen angir maksimalt antall tegn som kan angis i tekstboksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A> property allows you to specify the width of the text box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A>egenskapen kan du angi bredden på tekstboksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>til å fastslå verdien som er angitt i tekstboksen av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputPassword control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: HtmlInputPassword-kontrollen gir en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange>hendelse som aktiveres når det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>egenskapen endres verdier mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en hendelsesbehandling som utfører et egendefinert sett med instruksjoner hver gang hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HtmlInputPassword control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For HtmlInputPassword kontrollen inneholder ikke en innebygd måte å legge inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en annen kontroll på siden som støtter sendes tilbake til serveren, som en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>eller en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputPassword, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlInputPassword, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"> </xref> klasse bruker standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control using default values.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>kontrollere bruker standardverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>

trans-unit.source: It creates a `password` type text box control.
trans-unit.target: Det opprettes en `password` typen tekstbokskontroll.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "password" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| "Passord" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Renders the attributes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser attributtene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword"> </xref> kontrollen til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes fjerner den `Value` attributtet fra samlingen visningen tilstand for å hindre at gjengitt, og kaller deretter basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.
